Group Income Team â€¢ November 13, 2025

Group Income is the only basic income system that works in a completely privacy-preserving way, distributing funds while avoiding the Sybil attack without needing your identity.

And now weâ€™ve upgraded it with an end-to-end encrypted video player!

Localized Into 10 Languages!

Group Income 2.5 now speaks 10 languages!

You can now use Group Income in English, Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese, German, French, Russian and Ukrainian!

Music Video

Big Tech wants to KYC and CBDC everyone into a dystopia.

Can Group Income save us from the control grid? Find out!

Release Notes

New Features

  • Video player! You can now upload videos to chat and play them back!
  • New translations for Korean, Chinese, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Russian, and Ukrainian (we already had French!)

Improvements

  • Red dot now shown for any chatroom activity
  • Send area handles mixed attachment types better
  • Send area attachment gallery scrolls with many mixed attachment types on mobile

Bugfixes

  • Fixed new DMs not showing up after key rotation
  • Fixed handling of in-app links within chat
  • Hopefully fixed delayed distribution period notification
  • Fixed virtual keyboard occluding chat send message area
  • Clicking on message reply links should now work for distant messages
  • Chatrooms will no longer load all messages when linked to top of chatroom

See the complete list of changes.
